Docs.summary: Gets an array containing the parameter names passed to the task.
Docs.returns: An array containing the parameter names passed to the task.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The returned array excludes the `Condition` and `ContinueOnError` parameters.
If no parameters are passed to the task, this method returns an empty array.
